tile.name: start
tile.text: START

tile.name: hand1
tile.text: Yay! You are on a hand!

tile.name: hand2
tile.text: The kid forgets to wash hands.

tile.name: hand3
tile.text: Silly kid rinses with water and doesn't use soap. Poop is sticky!

tile.name: hand4
tile.text: That tricky kid pretends to wash to fool his teacher, but doesn't!

tile.name: hand5
tile.text: The kid is too busy to wash hands. Move forward 4.

tile.name: hand6
tile.text: That mean kid washes with soap. Back to Start!

tile.name: hand7
tile.text: A friend makes fun of this kid for wearing poop because he did not use soap, so the kid washes with soap! Back to Start!

tile.name: hand8
tile.text: That silly kid rinses with water, forgetting poop is sticky!

tile.name: hand9
tile.text: If they forget soap, their hands sometimes smell slightly of poop. Don't ya love that odor?!

tile.name: hand10
tile.text: Germs divide! If you have any germs in Start, bring one here.

tile.name: hand11
tile.text: The kid is playing in the dirt. You stick on his hand.

tile.name: hand12
tile.text: Kid tries to swat a fly. You are glad he missed. If that fly has poop on its legs, it might also have friends of yours!

tile.name: hand13
tile.text: Kid wipes hands on his shirt. He still forgets poop is sticky! Move forward 3.

tile.name: hand14
tile.text: Dinner smells way too good for the kid to stop & wash hands with soap. Move forward two.

tile.name: hand15
tile.text: Kid pretends to use soap, but just rinses his hands. You are still stuck on! Go forward one.

tile.name: hand16
tile.text: Your tummy is rumbling. (Oh, you have no tummy. It must be the kid's tummy.)

tile.name: hand17
tile.text: That mean kid remembers to wash with soap. Back to Start!

tile.name: hand18
tile.text: The kid eats with you (& poop) on his hands! You are in a gut!

tile.name: hand19
tile.text: Sister reminds kid to wash hands. Bask to Start!

tile.name: hand20
tile.text: That nasty mom makes the kid wash with soap. Back to Start!

tile.name: hand21
tile.text: The kid forgets to wash hands before eating with his poopy hands! You are in a gut!

tile.name: hand22
tile.text: Mommy reminds the kid to wash hands. Will he? Go back 6 and find out.

tile.name: fly1
tile.text: Flying is scary! You are lucky poop is sticky, so you don't fall off!

tile.name: fly2
tile.text: CRASH! Oh, no, a window screen! Go back one.

tile.name: fly3
tile.text: Fly sees food! Roll again

tile.name: fly4
tile.text: Rotten food near a kitchen smells yummy to your fly! Go forward 4.

tile.name: fly5
tile.text: Land on a cow's nose. It twitches the fly off. Go forward 3.

tile.name: fly6
tile.text: ZAP!! That frog's tongue was too fast for your fly. Back to Start!

tile.name: fly7
tile.text: Crash: Hit a window screen. Go back 6.

tile.name: fly8
tile.text: In the kitchen now. That food smells delicious!

tile.name: fly9
tile.text: They keep food covered up. Back to Start!

tile.name: fly10
tile.text: Land on food that gets eaten. You are in someone's gut!

tile.name: fly11
tile.text: Land on food, but Mommy sees you and tosses out that bite. Back to Start!

tile.name: fly12
tile.text: Land on food that gets eaten. You are in someone's gut!

tile.name: fly13
tile.text: Land on food that gets eaten. You are in someone's gut!

tile.name: fly14
tile.text: Your ride got swatted! Back to Start!

tile.name: poop1
tile.text: Poop goes into a latrine, but you stick to a hand!

tile.name: poop2
tile.text: The kid poops outside. Move forward 5.

tile.name: poop3
tile.text: Poop outdoors! It is fun to be poop in the grass. Move forward 4.

tile.name: poop4
tile.text: The kid poops outside! What a nice breeze! (Well, maybe not to those downwind of you…). Move forward 3.

tile.name: poop5
tile.text: Poop goes into a latrine, but you stick to a hand!

tile.name: poop6
tile.text: Poop goes into a toilet, so I am trapped. Back to Start!

tile.name: poop7
tile.text: The fresh air is great!

tile.name: poop8
tile.text: A fly lands on the poop and you stick to a leg. You are flying now!

tile.name: poop9
tile.text: Sunny day and the poop dries out. Back to Start!

tile.name: poop10
tile.text: Rain comes and washes poop into a leak in a pipe.

tile.name: poop11
tile.text: Rain comes and washes poop into the river. You are cruising now! Move forward 3

tile.name: poop12
tile.text: Sunny day and the poop dries. You are not getting to another gut this way! Back to Start!

tile.name: poop13
tile.text: Washed to river! Move forward one.

tile.name: poop14
tile.text: You are in the river. Lucky poop floats!

tile.name: poop15
tile.text: Eaten by fish. Back to Start!

tile.name: poop16
tile.text: Someone is gathering water. Go to jerry can!

tile.name: poop17
tile.text: Someone is gathering water. Go to jerry can!

tile.name: poop18
tile.text: Too much sun is bad for germs. Back to Start!

tile.name: poop19
tile.text: Someone is gathering water. Go to jerry can!

tile.name: poop20
tile.text: Floated right past the village. Back to Start!

tile.name: pipe1
tile.text: Whee! Sliding down a pipe!

tile.name: pipe2
tile.text: UH OH. The town put chlorine in the piped water! Back to Start!

tile.name: pipe3
tile.text: Look, there is another germ! Hi, buddy!

tile.name: pipe4
tile.text: The water looks clean. It is good they cannot see you!

tile.name: pipe5
tile.text: It's dark in here.

tile.name: pipe6
tile.text: It's fun to ride with so many friends in the water pipe!

tile.name: pipe7
tile.text: YAY! Someone poured you out of the pipe and into their Jerry can! Move forward 5.

tile.name: pipe8
tile.text: Some hard-working kid just carried their Jerry can a long way just to pick you up (with some water)! Go forward 4.

tile.name: pipe9
tile.text: You've just been pumped from pipe to Jerry can. Getting closer! Go forward 3.

tile.name: pipe10
tile.text: Whoosh! Through the tap and into a Jerry can! Go forward two

tile.name: pipe11
tile.text: You get out of the pipe and spilled on the ground. Back to Start!

tile.name: jerry1
tile.text: You made it to the big Jerry can they take home!

tile.name: jerry2
tile.text: Those mean people used the water for cooking, but boiled food thoroughly. Back to Start!

tile.name: jerry3
tile.text: Those nasty people put chlorine in the water. Back to Start!

tile.name: jerry4
tile.text: Those people use a water filter just to keep you (& poop) out of their water. How rude! Back to start!

tile.name: jerry5
tile.text: They boil the water. Roll a die: If 6, they boil too quickly and you got a hot bath and into a gut. Otherwise they boil 2 minutes. Back to start!

tile.name: jerry6
tile.text: They drink the untreated water. You are in a new gut!

tile.name: jerry7
tile.text: They drink the untreated water. You are in a new gut!

tile.name: end
tile.text: END
